oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Real photo postcard of seven German soldiers in front of damaged wooden structure
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The photograph depicts seven men in uniform standing in front of a damaged wooden building. A note written in German appears on the right hand margin. The words "Welt=Krieg! 1914-15" stand out. Most of the men are wearing the M1910 coat but the man in front left is wearing a transitional M1915 bluse with M1910 cuffs. The postmark reads "14.5.15," "11 BAYER JNF DIV." The card was sent by Lance Cpl. Sommer, 1st Btry., Foot Art. Regt. No. 4, 119th Div., 11th Army of the East. [see also GWchat200]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Sommer, Albin
